title: Turkish Coffee: Fortune in the Grounds
description: One-minute skill: Turkish Coffee: Fortune in the Grounds.

hook.text: Turkish coffee is brewed in a tiny pot, served in a tiny cup, and read in the grounds it leaves behind.

buildup.text: Coffee ground to powder is mixed with water and sugar in a cezve (long-handled pot) and heated until it foams.
